item.description:
Join founders Chris and Grace Tkach as they celebrate the official launch of the brewery and be among the first to try Pandora and Patriarch beyond the brewery walls. 

There's been a lot of excitement around the launch of Idle Hands, and I am definitely interested to try their first two releases

Additional specialty beers will also be available.

For directions to Atwoods, visit: http://www.atwoodstavern.com/directions/

This one may be tough since its on a Monday, but I'll definitely be trying to go! Lets see how much interest there is...

Cheers!

Rich
item.name: Idle Hands Craft Ales Debut Party
